text:
My 6 years old son has been learning piano with Edvox for about a year and I see that his interest in music and focus has increased a lot. He can do simple sight reading of (very) basic scores and plays them independently at home, even though his strength on his left hand and little finger isn’t that great.

Teacher Ms Tai Yun Ming is patient with him and makes both theory and practical fun so that he wants to go back weekly.

My daughters are with Edvox music school for a couple of years, and are progressing well with their music learning.

Ms Ashley Wong is my eldest daughter's piano teacher, and she is very responsible and patient in bringing up my daughter to Diploma Grade in piano.

She is also a good piano accompaniment for my second daughter's, for her violin higher performance grade.

Ms Ashley Wong is also very enthusiastic in organising many performance opportunities, and revommending music competitions.

My daughter has been taking piano lessons with Teacher Ashley, who is patient and friendly. She really enjoys the classes and looks forward to her weekly lessons. Her piano skills have improved significantly.

I’ve been sending my daughter for piano lessons for 3 years now. Miss Wong has been very patience and dedicated teacher. I would recommend Edvox music school as it convenient to my place, conducive environment.

Teacher Hui Won very good and patient to my daughter for piano classes. Recommend to come here for piano classes. Music school ambience is also very good, staff is very well mannered, kind and comfortable to chat with sometimes!
